abstract: BP’s Russian partners said that a general shareholders’ meeting for a joint venture had been held in violation of Russian law.
snippet: BP’s Russian partners said that a general shareholders’ meeting for a joint venture had been held in violation of Russian law.
lead_paragraph: BP’s grasp on its extensive oil assets in Russia became more tenuous Thursday after its Russian partners said that a general shareholders’ meeting for a joint venture had been held in violation of Russian law.

headline.main: Allegations in Russia Could Hurt BP Venture
headline.print_headline: Allegations In Russia Could Hurt BP Venture
